readable.title: 3047264346_e24601bfbf
readable.content: A girl and guy dressed up in costumes A man dressed as " Teen Wolf " hugs a woman made up like a vampire . A man in a werewolf mask is with a woman wearing elf ears . The man wearing the mask and sunglasses has his arm around the woman who is wearing fake pointed ears . Two individuals dressed up like animals are posing for the camera .
